body:
This underlying behavior is incorrect since the interceptors are designed to interact with an email after it has been generated, but before it has ben sent. While it could be useful to interact with the email before it is generated, an interceptor would not be the desired place to do this, there is a `before_action` that already exists to do this.

What are you trying to do exactly? You could modify the locale using a `before_action` in the mailer itself:

```
  #   class Notifier < ActionMailer::Base
  #     before_action :add_inline_attachment!
  #
  #     def welcome
  #       mail
  #     end
  #
  #     private
  #
  #       def add_inline_attachment!
  #         attachments.inline["footer.jpg"] = File.read('/path/to/filename.jpg')
  #       end
  #   end
```
